title: Store help
body: Hi, I'm wondering why heartseeker vayne is unavailable but is in the store?

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, this is a legacy skin. It sounds like the store just had a temporary hiccup, as she shouldn't be on the store now.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
That is a legacy akin so it isn't available for purchase currently, it is only in the shop for a short period of time for special events.
